page.title: 10SUTTON HOUSING, B'HAM
page.content: MY HOUSE IS IN MOORFIELD DRIVE, SUTTON COLDFIELD. IT IS ONE OF MANY HOUSES IN THE DRIVE WHICH ALL LOOK SIMILAR. THE FRONT GARDEN HAS A LARGE PATCH OF GRASS WITH TWO TREES, A CONCRETE DRIVE AND A{CRAZY PAVING}PATH. THE GARAGE DOOR IS BRIGHT YELLOW AND SO IS THE FRONT. THERE ARE USUALLY TWO CARS OUTSIDE, A RED FIAT AND A BLACK METRO. THERE IS A WHITE GATE AT THE SIDE OF THE HOUSE LEADING TO THE BACK GARDEN WHICH HAS A BROWN FENCE AROUND THE PERIMETER. IN THE BACK GARDEN THERE IS A FAIR SIZED LAWN WITH FLOWER BEDS IN STONE WALLS LEADING HIGHER UP TO THE TOP WHERE THE FENCE IS. THERE IS ALSO A GATE WHERE THE LAWN MOWER, GARDEN TOOLS, PLANTS, POTS, AND A HOSE PIPE IN IT. BY THE SHED A CLIMBING FRAME AND SWING STAND ON A PATCH OF UNWEEDED GROUND. OUR HOUSE IS SEMI-DETACHED.
